question: Ministry of Jal Shakti along with which Union Ministry launched JSA II: Catch the Rain Awareness Generation Campaign?
option1: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
option4: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
answer: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
explanation:
National Water Mission under Ministry of Jal Shakti in collaboration with Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan under Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports has launched the JSA II: Catch the Rain Awareness Generation Campaign.
The first phase of the campaign for awareness generation will be undertaken from mid-December 2020 to March 2021.
